partnerships.meta.title: Partnerships
partnerships.meta.description: Partner with Simple Deutsch to support migrant integration in Germany through AI-driven language education and digital skills training.
partnerships.hero.title: Partnerships
partnerships.hero.intro: Simple Deutsch partners with companies, universities, and non-profits to support migrant integration in Germany through language learning, digital skills, and AI-assisted education.
partnerships.partners.heading: Partners of the Simple Deutsch
partnerships.sections.preLogos.p1: We build partnerships with organizations that share our goal: helping newcomers navigate life in Germany through clear language and practical digital learning.
partnerships.sections.preLogos.p2: Typical collaborations include sponsored learning cohorts, co-created content, and local outreach programs that connect people to trusted resources.
partnerships.sections.preLogos.p3: Whether you are a company, foundation, or public institution, we can shape a pilot format that fits your audience, timeline, and impact goals.
partnerships.sections.postLogos.p1: Every partnership starts with a focused objective, such as improving language access for job seekers, supporting integration programs, or expanding digital confidence.
partnerships.sections.postLogos.p2: From there, we define a lightweight rollout plan with clear responsibilities, shared milestones, and measurable outcomes.
partnerships.sections.postLogos.p3: We provide adaptable learning formats that can be embedded into existing initiatives and tailored to different language levels.
partnerships.sections.postLogos.p4: Partners receive regular progress updates and practical recommendations to improve engagement over time.
partnerships.sections.postLogos.p5: If you are exploring a collaboration, we can start with a short discovery call and propose next steps within a few days.
partnerships.cta.title: Let's collaborate
partnerships.cta.lead: Tell us what kind of partnership you have in mind - we'll suggest a simple pilot and next steps.
